title: Regulation (EEC) No 658/74 of the Commission of 25 March 1974 amending Regulation (EEC) Nos 1108/68 and 685/69 as regards the level of certain rates applicable to butter and skimmed-milk powder bought in by intervention agencies
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 658/74 OF THE COMMISSION  of 25 March 1974  amending Regulation (EEC) Nos 1108/68 and 685/69 as regards the level of certain rates applicable to butter and skimmed-milk powder bought in by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1108/68, the expression "0.025 units of account" is replaced by the expression "0.031 units of account".

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1974.  (1)OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 13. (2)OJ No L 49, 21.2.1974, p. 2. (3)OJ No L 184, 29.7.1968, p. 34. (4)OJ No L 28, 1.2.1974, p. 66. (5)OJ No L 90, 15.4.1969, p. 12. (6)OJ No L 216, 4.8.1973, p. 10.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1974.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI
